Class RegistryValue.Filter

java.lang.Object
com.github.robtimus.os.windows.registry.RegistryValue.Filter
Enclosing class:
RegistryValue
public static final class RegistryValue.Filter extends Object
A filter for registry values.
Author:
Rob Spoor

  • Method Details

    • name

      public RegistryValue.Filter name(Predicate<? super String> namePredicate)
      Specifies a predicate for the name. Only registry values that match the predicate will be returned.
      Parameters:
      namePredicate - The predicate for the name, or null to not use a predicate.
      Returns:
      This filter.

    • classes

      @SafeVarargs public final RegistryValue.Filter classes(Class<? extends RegistryValue>... classes)
      Specifies registry value classes for which to include instances.

      This method is additive; calling it multiple times will add classes for which to include instances. However, if this method is never called, instances of all registry value classes will be returned.

      Parameters:
      classes - The classes for which to include instances.
      Returns:
      This filter.

    • strings

      public RegistryValue.Filter strings()
      Specifies that all string registry values should be included. This method is shorthand for calling classes(Class...) with class literals for StringValue and MultiStringValue.
      Returns:
      This filter.

    • binaries

      public RegistryValue.Filter binaries()
      Specifies that all binary registry values should be included. This method is shorthand for calling classes(Class...) with a class literal for BinaryValue.
      Returns:
      This filter.

    • words

      public RegistryValue.Filter words()
      Specifies that all WORD (or numeric) registry values should be included. This method is shorthand for calling classes(Class...) with class literals for DWordValue and QWordValue.
      Returns:
      This filter.

    • settable

      public RegistryValue.Filter settable()
      Specifies that all settable registry values should be included. This method is shorthand for calling classes(Class...) with class literals for all the SettableRegistryValue sub classes.
      Returns:
      This filter.
